name: Tengu (ZX Spectrum Next)
description:
Cursed by the supernatural Tengu, your only means of escape is to complete the 100 fiendish puzzles that have been set by the mystical creature. Use your powers of logic and deduction to reveal the hidden picture and advance to the next puzzle.

  • Addictive picture puzzle gameplay
  • Atmospheric graphics
  • Digital in-game soundtrack
  • 100 fiendish levels
  • 3 difficulty settings
  • 2 game types
  • Limited-edition physical version available while stocks last
